# <a name="permanently-delete-email-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="31c43-102">永久刪除在 Outlook.com 中的電子郵件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-102">Permanently delete email in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31c43-103">如果您想要刪除的電子郵件或清空收件匣：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="31c43-104">選取您想要刪除 （或選取圓形的郵件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="31c43-105">下一步]**收件匣**頂端的郵件清單中選取收件匣中的所有郵件)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="31c43-106">在頁面頂端，選取 [**刪除**] (整個**空的資料夾**，或**空焦點** / **清空其他**如果您有焦點收件匣啟用)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="31c43-107">若要清除所有的已刪除的電子郵件、 開啟 [[刪除的項目] 資料夾](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems)並選取 [**空白] 資料夾**，然後選取 [**可復原的項目**在頁面頂端和選取**空資料夾**一次。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31c43-108">若要深入了解，請閱讀[刪除 Outlook.com 電子郵件](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31c43-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
